caption.p: Evaluation of NiV neutralizing antibody responses following immunization of pigs with BoHV-4 vectors. Pigs were immunized with BoHV-4-A-CMV-NiV-FΔTK, BoHV-4-A-CMV-NiV-GΔTK or ALVAC NiV G on 0 (prime) and 21 (boost) dpv. NiV neutralizing antibody titers were assessed using NiV-M ( A) and NiV-B ( B) pseudoviruses and presented as the reciprocal serum dilution to inhibit pseudovirus entry by 90% (IC 90). Neutralizing antibody responses were confirmed by classical VNT; longitudinal serum samples were assessed for neutralization of NiV-B ( C) and day 42 sera tested for cross-neutralization of NiV-M, NiV-B, and HeV ( D). Sera was assessed for neutralization of NiV-mediated cell–cell fusion using a quantitative fusion assay with cells expressing NiV-M ( E) or NiV-B ( F) glycoproteins. Mean data ± SEM are shown for each vaccine group.
